    • getNext

      public Squares getNext​(int n, Squares current)
      A method that is invoked when a user clicks on this square.
      Parameters:
      n - Direction in which to get the next square from
      current - The current square the algorithm is using
      Returns:
      Returns an AlgorithmSquare of the next square in that direction

    • canMove

      public boolean canMove​(Squares next)
      A method that determines if there is a wall on the next possible tile
      Parameters:
      next - checks the next square
      Returns:
      True if the player can move there (is a path)
